meanings.sent1: The metadata of the file includes the author's name.
meanings.sent2: Librarians use metadata to organize books on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The metadata of the photo revealed the camera settings used.
meanings.sent4: The metadata acted like a detective, uncovering hidden details in the document.
meanings.sent5: Remember to always check the metadata before sharing any information online.

meanings.sent1: Scientists rely on metadata to understand the research findings.
